GK19bahcar1u:427: tasya hi gacchato yadṛcchayā kathamapyaṃsukamiva mārgalatāsu mānasamasmāsu muhūrtamāsaktamāsīt /
GK19bahcar1u:429: alasaḥ khalu loko yadevaṃ sulabhasauhārdāni yena kenacinna krīṇāti mahatāṃ manāṃsi /
GK19bahcar1u:430: so 'yamaudāryātiśayaḥ so 'pi mahātmanāmitarajanadurlabho yenopakaraṇīkurvanti tribhuvanam' iti /
GK19bahcar1u:432: aparedyurudyati bhagavati dyumaṇāvuddāmadyutāvabhidrutatārake tiraskṛtatamasi tāmarasavyāsavyasanini sahasraraśmau śoṇamutīryāyāntī,
GK19bahcar1u:434: sphuṭitātimuktakakusumastabakasamatviṣi saṭāle mahati mṛgapatāviva gaurī turaṅgame sthita,
GK19bahcar1u:442: kucapūrṇakalaśayorupari ratnaprālambamālikāmaruṇaharitakiraṇakisalayinīṃ kasyāpi puṇyavato hṛdayapraveśavanamālikāmiva baddhāṃ dhārayantī,
GK19bahcar1u:443: prakoṣṭhaniviṣṭasyaikasya hāṭakakaṭakasya marakatamakaravedikāsanāthasya haritīkṛtadigantābhirmaṃyūkhasaṃtatibhiḥ sthalakamalinībiriva lakṣmīśaṅkhayānugamyamānā,
GK19bahcar1u:449: tamālaśyāmalena mṛgamadāmodaniṣyadinā tilakabindunā mudritamiva manobhavasarvasvaṃ vadanamudvahantī,
GK19bahcar1u:466: dūrādeva ca dadhīcapremṇā sarasvatyā luṇṭhiteva manorathaiḥ,
GK19bahcar1u:482: krameṇa cātīte madhyandinasamaye śoṇamavatīrṇāyāṃ sāvitryāṃ snātumutsāritaparijanā sākūteva mālatī kusumasrastaśāyinīṃ samupasṛtya sarasvatīmābabhāṣe--devi,
GK19bahcar1u:485: sarasvatī tu dadhīcasadeśāśaṅkinī kiṃ vakṣyatīti stananihitavāmakaranakharakiraṇadanturitamudbhidyamānakutūhalāṅkuranikaramiva hṛdayamuttarīyakūlavalkalaikadeśena saṃchādayantī,
GK19bahcar1u:487: samutphullasya mukhaśaśino lāvaṇyapravāheṇa śṛṅgārarasenevāplāvayantī sakalaṃ jīvalokam,
GK19bahcar1u:491: “upāṃśu kathaya' iti kapolatalanatibimbitāṃ lajjayā karṇamūlamiva mālatīṃ praveśayantī madhurayā girā sudhīramuvāca--“sakhi mālati,
GK19bahcar1u:495: sā na kācidyā na bhavasi me svasā sakhī praṇayinī prāṇasamā ca /
GK19bahcar1u:496: niyujyatāṃ yāvataḥ kāryasya kṣamaṃ kṣodīyasī garīyasī vā śarīrakamidam /
GK19bahcar1u:507: na ca bāliśatā capalatā cāraṇatā vā vācālatāyāḥ kāraṇam /
GK19bahcar1u:510: yadaiva dṛṣṭāsi devena tata evārabyāsya kāmo guruḥ,
GK19bahcar1u:537: tadevamagocare girāmasīti śrutvā devī pramāṇam' ityabhidhāya tūṣṇīmabhūta /
GK19bahcar1u:538: atha sarasvatī prītivisphāritena cakṣuṣā pratyavādīta-“ayi, na śaknomi bahu bāṣitum /
GK19bahcar1u:543: atiprasādāya' iti vyāhṛtya praharṣaparavaśā praṇamya prajavinā turageṇa tatāra śoṇam /
GK19bahcar1u:546: utkaṇṭhābhārabhṛtā ca tāmyatā cetasā kalpāyitaṃ kathaṅkathamapi divasaśeṣamanaiṣīt /
GK19bahcar1u:549_0: prahasitāmiva sitāṃ diśaṃ paurandarīṃ darīmiva kesariṇi muñcati candramasi sarasvatī
GK19bahcar1u:549_1: śucini cīnāṃśukasukumāratare taraṅgiṇi dugūlakomalaśayana iva śoṇasaikate samupaviṣṭā
GK19bahcar1u:551: ayamasāvāhṛto hṛdayadayito janaḥ' iti śravaṇasamīpavartinā nivedyamānamadanasaṃdeśevendunā,
GK19bahcar1u:552: vikīryamāṇanakhakiraṇacakravālena vālavyajanīkṛtacandrakalākalāpeneva kareṇa vījayantī svedinaṃ kapolapaṭṭam,
GK19bahcar1u:553_0: “atra dadhīcādṛte na kenacitpraveṣṭavyam' iti tiraśvīnaṃ cittabhuvā pātitāṃ vilāsavetralatāmiva
GK19bahcar1u:553_1: bālamṛṇālikāmadhistanaṃ stanayantī kathamapi hṛdayena vahanti pratipālayāmāsa āsīccāsyā
GK19bahcar1u:553_2: manasi--“ahamapi nāma sarasvatī yatrāmunā manaujanmanā jānatyeva paravaśīkṛtā /
GK19bahcar1u:554: tatra kā gaṇanetarāsu tapasvinīṣvatitaralāsu taruṇīṣu' iti /
GK19bahcar1u:563: antaḥsphuratā mattamadanakarikarṇaśahkhāyamānena pratimendunā prathamasamāgamavilāsavilakṣasmiteneva dhavalīkriyamāṇaikakapolodaro mālatīdvitīyo dadhīcaḥ /
GK19bahcar1u:564: āgatya ca hṛdayagatadayitānūpuraravavimiśrayeva haṃsagadgadayā girā kṛtasaṃbhāṣaṇo yathā manmathaḥ samājñāpayati,
GK19bahcar1u:573: tasmai ca jātamātrāyaiva “samyaksarahasyāḥ sarvevedāḥ sarvāṇi ca śāstrāṇi sakalāśca kalā matprabhāvātṝ svayamāvirbhaviṣyanti' iti varamadātṝ /
GK19bahcar1u:574: sadbhartṛślāghayā darśayitumiva hṛdayenādāya dadhīcaṃ pitāmahādeśātsamaṃ sāvitryā punarapi brahnalokamāruroha /
GK19bahcar1u:575_0: gatāyāṃ ca tasyāṃ dadhīco 'pi hṛdaye hrādinyevābhihato bhārgavavaṃśasaṃbhūtasya bhrāturbrāhnaṇasya
GK19bahcar1u:575_1: jāyāmakṣamālābhidhānāṃ munikanyakāmātmasūnoḥ saṃvardhanāya niyujya virahāturastapase vanamasāt /
GK19bahcar1u:576: yasminnevāvasare sarasvatyasūta tanayaṃ tasminnevākṣamālāpi sutaṃ prasūtavatī /
GK19bahcar1u:577: tau tu sā nirviśeṣaṃ sāmānyastanyādinā śanaiḥ śanaiḥ śiśū samavardhayat /
GK19bahcar1u:580: atha sārasvato māturmahimnā yauvanārambha evāvirbhūtāśeṣavidyāsaṃbhārastasminsavayasi bhrātari preyasi prāṇasame suhṛdi vatse vāṅmayaṃ samastameva saṃcārayāmāsa /
GK19bahcar1u:581: cakāra ca kṛtadāraparigrahasyāsya tasmiṃnneva pradeśe prītyā prītikūṭanāmānaṃ nivāsam /
GK19bahcar1u:587: jaṭī ca bhūtvā tapasyato janayitureva jagāmāntikam /
GK19bahcar1u:595: askhalitapravṛtto bhāgīrathīpravāha iva pāvanaḥ prāvartata vimalo vaṃśaḥ /
GK19bahcar1u:639: atikrāmati ca kāle prasavaparamparābhiranavaratamāpatati vikāśini vātsyāyanakule,
GK19bahcar1u:640: krameṇa kuberanāmā vainateya iva gurupakṣapāti dvijo janma lebhe /
GK19bahcar1u:641: tasyābhavannacyutar iśāno haraḥ pāśupataśceti catvāro yugārambhā iva brāhnatejojanyamānaprajāvistārā nārāyaṇabāhudaṇjā iva saccakranandakāstanayāḥ /
GK19bahcar1u:642: tatra pāśupatasyaika evābhavad bhūbhāra ivācalakulasthitiḥ sthiraścaturudadhigambhīror'thapatiriti nāmnā samagrāgrajanmacakracūḍāmaṇirmahātmā sūnuḥ /
GK19bahcar1u:643_0: so 'janayad bhṛguṃ haṃsaṃ śuciṃ kaviṃ mahīdataṃ dharmaṃ jātavedasaṃ citrabhānuṃ tryakṣaṃ
GK19bahcar1u:644: alabhata ca citrabhānusteṣāṃ madhye rājadevyabhidhānāyāṃ brāhnaṇyāṃ bāṇamātmajam /
GK19bahcar1u:645: sa bāla eva balavato vidhervaśādupasaṃpannayā vyayujyata jananyā /
GK19bahcar1u:648: kṛtopanayanādikriyākalāpasya samāvṛttasya cāsya caturdaśavarṣadeśīyasya pitāpi śrutismṛtivihitaṃ kṛtvā dvijajanocitaṃ nikhilaṃ puṇyajātaṃ kālenādaśamīstha evāstamagamat /
GK19bahcar1u:649: saṃsthite ca pitari mahatā śokenābhīlamanuprāpto divāniśaṃ dahnamānahṛdayaḥ kathaṅkathamapi katipayāndivasānātmagṛha evānaiṣīt /
GK19bahcar1u:650: gate ca viralatāṃ śoke śanaiḥ śanairavinayanidānatayā svātantrayasya,
GK19bahcar1u:689_1: satsvapipitṛpitāmahopātteṣu brāhnaṇajanociteṣu vibhaveṣu sati cāvicchinne vidyāprasaṅge gṛhānniragāt /
GK19bahcar1u:690: agācca niravagraho grahavāniva navayauvanena svairiṇā manasā mahatāmupahāsyatām /
GK19bahcar1u:697: mahataśca kālāttameva bhūyo vātsyāyanavaṃśāśramamātmano janmabhuvaṃ brāhnaṇādhivāsamagamatṝ /
GK19bahcar1u:698: tatra ca ciradarśanādabhinavībhūtasnehasadbhāvaiḥ sasaṃstavaprakaṭitajñāteyairāptairutsavadivasa ivānanditāgamano bālamitramaṇḍalamadhyagato mokṣasukhamivānvabhavatṝ /
GK19bahcar1u:699: iti śrīmahākavibāṇamaṭṭakṛtau harṣacarite vātsyāyanavaṃśavarṇanaṃ nāma prathama ucchvāsaḥ
